import React, {useContext} from 'react' import CartContext from './CartContext' const CartItem = ({item, cantidad}) => { const { title, imagen, stock, price} = item const {eliminateFromCart}= useContext(CartContext) return (
{title}
{/* */}

{cantidad}

{/* */}
Total $ {item.price * cantidad}
) } export default CartItem
